se.vgregion.dao.domain.patterns.repository.db
Interface DatabaseRepository<T extends Entity<ID>,ID extends Serializable,PK extends Serializable>

Type Parameters:
T - The Entity Type
ID - The ID of the Entity
PK - The type of the primary key
All Superinterfaces:
Repository<T,ID>
All Known Subinterfaces:
JpaRepository<T,ID,PK>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractJpaRepository, DefaultJpaRepository
public interface DatabaseRepository<T extends Entity<ID>,ID extends Serializable,PK extends Serializable>
extends Repository<T,ID>

An extended repository interface with additional methods for find and remove entities by its database primary key.

Author:
Anders Asplund - Callista Enterprise

Method Summary
 T findByPrimaryKey(PK pk)
          Finds the instance of T identified by the database primary key.
 void removeByPrimaryKey(PK pk)
          Remove entity by the database primary key.
 
Methods inherited from interface se.vgregion.dao.domain.patterns.repository.Repository
contains, find, findAll, flush, merge, persist, refresh, remove, remove, store
 

Method Detail

findByPrimaryKey

T findByPrimaryKey(PK pk)
Finds the instance of T identified by the database primary key. The primary key and the ID of the entity is not necessarily the same. I.e the ID of a person could be it's social security number, while the primary key is normally generated by the database.

Parameters:
pk - The primary key
Returns:
an object of T

removeByPrimaryKey

void removeByPrimaryKey(PK pk)
Remove entity by the database primary key. The primary key and the ID of the entity is not necessarily the same. I.e the ID of a person could be it's social security number, while the primary key is normally generated by the database.

Parameters:
pk - The primary key
